p:
Asafoetida ( F. assafoetida L.) belongs to the Apiaceae family which obtained from the exudates of the living underground rhizome or tap roots of the plant. F. assafoetida or gum-resin is known as “Anghouzeh”, “Khorakoma” and “Anguzakoma” in Iran.
55 It has been used in traditional medicine and as a spice in different foods in India and Nepal.
55
